articles.title: Apple confirms Apple Pay is coming to Argentina and Peru 'soon'
articles.description: Apple has updated the Latin American Apple Pay page to include mention that both Argentina and Peru will be coming online "soon."
articles.content:
Apple has confirmed that Apple Pay is coming to both Argentina and Peru soon after updating its Latin American webpage to say so. now, the Apple Pay page includes "Próximamente en Argentina y Perú," or "Coming soon in Argentina and Peru."

articles.title: Apple teases Apple Pay coming soon to Argentina and Peru
articles.description: After a bank in Peru teased the imminent launch of Apple Pay in the country, Apple is now the one saying it will launch soon.
articles.content:
After a bank in Peru teased the imminent launch of Apple Pay in the country last week, Apple is now the one saying its own payment service will be launching soon in Argentina and Peru.

articles.title: Vista Oil pays German firm $140 mln for half its stake in Argentina concessions
articles.description: Mexico-based Oil company Vista Oil & Gas on Monday said it was buying 50% of German unlisted oil and gas company Wintershall Dea's stake in two concessions in Argentina's Vaca Muerta shale oil deposit.
articles.content:
BUENOS AIRES, Jan 17 (Reuters) - Mexico-based Oil company Vista Oil & Gas (VISTAA.MX)on Monday said it was buying 50% of German unlisted oil and gas company Wintershall Dea's stake in two concessions in Argentina's Vaca Muerta shale oil deposit.

articles.title: Power Fails Again As Argentine Capital Swelters In Heat Wave
articles.description: Power failed for tens of thousands of customers in Argentina's capital on Friday as temperatures once again climbed to a 65year high.
articles.content:
BUENOS AIRES, Argentina: Power failed for tens of thousands of customers in Argentina’s capital on Friday as temperatures once again climbed to a 65-year high.

articles.description: Argentina, Uruguay, Brazil and Paraguay are reeling from a historic heatwave with temperatures as high as 113F
articles.content:
Cities and towns across southern South America have been setting record high temperatures as the region swelters during a historic heatwave.

articles.title: Messi to miss another PSG game, says Covid recovery slow
articles.description: Lionel Messi will miss another game for Paris Saint-Germain after acknowledging that his recovery from Covid-19 has been slower than expected. The Argentina forward won't be available for Saturday's game against Brest at Parc des Princes, PSG coach Mauricio Pochettino said Friday. The 34-year-old Messi missed PSG's 1-1 draw at Lyon last Sunday when the French league returned
